phantom_lockpicks.description: A set of ethereal tools that shimmer like moonlight. These lockpicks can slip through even enchanted locks, leaving no trace of entry.

unbreakable_shackle.description: A padlock forged from midnight steel and bound with a protective hex. It emits a low hum when tampered with and is said to curse thieves with clumsy hands.

spyglass_of_farseeing.description: An ornate spyglass with a crystal lens that reveals not only great distances but hidden auras and veiled intentions. A must-have for spotting unseen threats.

howling_tripwire.description: A fine, near-invisible wire that releases a bone-chilling wail when disturbed. Perfect for catching trespassers or pranking rivals.

shadow_coffer.description: A shadowy box that swallows light and can only be opened by its rightful owner. Ideal for safeguarding the rarest treasures or dangerous secrets.

siren's_slip_oil.description: A sleek vial of shimmering oil that leaves surfaces as slick as ice. The faint scent of sea air accompanies its use, luring overconfident intruders to their downfall.

boots_of_ghostly_tread.description: These enchanted boots silence every step and leave no footprints, even in the thickest mud or snow. Ideal for infiltrating heavily guarded fortresses.

warden's_iron_chest.description: A colossal chest with bands of ancient iron. It seals with a spectral guardian that wards off thieves, testing their resolve with riddles of protection.

labyrinthine_door_mechanism.description: A contraption that creates secret doors so cunningly hidden they fool even the sharpest eyes. The mechanism shifts the wall as if alive.

fists_of_fury_brass_knuckles.description: These enchanted knuckles not only deliver devastating blows but also emit a fiery spark on impact. A favorite among underground fighters and collectors alike.

codex_of_veiled_defenses.description: A leather-bound tome that teaches arcane methods of protection. It includes diagrams for mystical traps and instructions for summoning minor guardians.
